title: How About A Friend At Night?
alternative_title: Yoru No Otomo Ni Dou Desuka? ; 夜のお友にどうですか？
status: Yoru No Otomo Ni Dou Desuka? ; 夜のお友にどうですか？
description:
Description :
        It's rumored that Yoshizawa, who works for a men's adult toy company, has the 'God Hand.' Any product she touches becomes an instant hit! You would think this kind of person has a lot of experience and great technique in the bedroom but in reality...
Meanwhile, why is this guy so hostile towards her?
A slightly unusual office Romcom that takes place in an adult goods company.
